summary: Professional website for Ajay Labour Service - a local labour service business in Tinsukia and Doomdooma, Assam. Multi-page website with booking system and ₹300 advance payment via UPI/online payment. Services include mason, electrician, plumber, painter, construction helper, and daily wage labour.
architectural_notes: Multi-page website architecture (Home, Services, Booking, About, Contact)
Payment gateway integration required for UPI and online payments
Trust-building elements: verified workers badge, quick response indicators, transparent pricing display
Booking management dashboard for tracking customer bookings and inquiries
Online payment gateway integration with UPI and card support for seamless transactions
Super admin role assigned to specific Internet Identity principal for dashboard access control
known_issues: Booking submission failures - error message 'failed to booking' displayed to users
Login option not working - authentication functionality failing
Payment system errors - UPI payment integration needs configuration with business UPI ID
Super admin role configuration failing during build process

existing_features.title: Create a Home page with headline 'Verified Labour Service in Tinsukia & Doomdooma – Fast, Reliable & Affordable', subheading explaining trusted local workers, and three prominent CTA buttons: Call Now, WhatsApp, and Book Now
Create a Booking page with a customer form collecting: Name, Phone Number, Location, Type of Work, Date Required, and Description
Implement ₹300 advance booking payment functionality with UPI/online payment integration, displaying the message 'Booking confirmed only after advance payment'
Implement trust-building elements throughout the site: Verified workers badge, Quick response indicator, Transparent pricing message, and Customer support availability
Optimize pages for SEO with keywords: 'Labour service in Tinsukia', 'Labour service in Doomdooma', 'Construction workers in Assam', 'Verified local labour'
Implement mobile-friendly responsive design with blue and orange color theme, ensuring fast loading and professional appearance across all devices
Add a customer testimonials section on the Home page displaying 3-4 reviews from satisfied customers with names, ratings, and brief comments about service quality
Create a photo gallery section showcasing completed work projects with before/after images or work-in-progress photos for different service categories
Add an FAQ (Frequently Asked Questions) section addressing common customer queries about booking process, payment, service areas, worker verification, and pricing
Implement WhatsApp direct booking integration by adding a WhatsApp button that opens a pre-filled message with booking template including service type, location, and contact request
Enhance the Services page with detailed descriptions for each of the six labour categories, including typical tasks, experience level of workers, and estimated project timelines
Enhance the About page with additional sections including business history timeline, team size information, service commitment promises, and community impact in Tinsukia and Doomdooma region

Enhance the Contact page by adding a contact form for general inquiries alongside existing phone, email, and service area information, and include a map section showing Tinsukia and Doomdooma service coverage
Add a prominent banner or notification section on HomePage encouraging users to share the preview link and provide feedback before final launch
Diagnose and resolve the deployment link connectivity issue preventing the website from being accessible at https://quickkaamservices.icp0.io
Update the phone number in CTAButtons component to 8136009930 for the Call Now button
Update the WhatsApp number in CTAButtons component to 8136009930
Update the phone number in Footer component to display 8136009930
Update the email address in Footer component to ajayyadavddm@gmail.com
Update the phone number in ContactPage to display 8136009930 in the contact details section
Update the email address in ContactPage to display ajayyadavddm@gmail.com in the contact details section
Update WhatsApp booking links in ServicesPage to use phone number 8136009930 for all six service categories

Create an admin dashboard page accessible at /admin route that displays all customer bookings in a table format showing booking ID, customer name, phone number, location, type of work, date required, payment status, and booking creation date
Implement role-based access control requiring Internet Identity login to view the admin dashboard, restricting access to authorized admin users only
Add filtering and sorting capabilities to the admin dashboard allowing filtering by payment status (paid/pending), date range, and work type, with ability to sort by booking date
Add a navigation link to the admin dashboard in the site header, visible only to authenticated admin users after Internet Identity login
Display real-time booking count and payment summary statistics on the admin dashboard showing total bookings, paid bookings, pending payments, and total revenue collected
Diagnose and fix the booking submission failure that displays 'failed to booking' error message to users when attempting to create a new booking
Add comprehensive error handling to the booking creation flow in BookingPage.tsx to catch and display specific error messages from the backend
Add console logging and error tracking to the useCreateBooking hook to capture detailed error information for debugging booking submission failures
Diagnose and fix the Internet Identity login functionality that is currently not working in the useInternetIdentity hook
Add comprehensive error handling and logging to the Internet Identity authentication flow in useInternetIdentity.ts to capture specific failure points
Test the complete user authentication flow including login on BookingPage, AdminGuard component, and admin dashboard access to ensure all protected routes work correctly after login fix
Update the frontend BookingPage.tsx to display UPI payment option and handle UPI-specific error messages from the backend during checkout
Test the complete UPI payment flow end-to-end from booking creation through Stripe checkout with UPI ID 8136009930@kotak811 to ensure successful payment processing
Update frontend AdminGuard component to handle super admin authentication flow and display appropriate messaging when super admin access is granted
Add console logging throughout the super admin configuration process to capture principal IDs, authentication status, and any authorization failures for debugging

new_feature_requests.summary: Home page with headline, subheading, and CTA buttons (Call Now, WhatsApp, Book Now)
Services page listing 6 labour categories (Mason, Electrician, Plumber, Painter, Construction Helper, Daily Wage Labour)
Booking page with customer form (name, phone, location, work type, date, description) and ₹300 advance payment button
About page with founder story
Contact page with phone, email, and service areas
UPI/online payment integration for ₹300 booking fee
Mobile-friendly responsive design with blue and orange color theme
SEO optimization with local keywords (Tinsukia, Doomdooma, Assam labour service)
Create a Services page listing six labour categories: Mason, Electrician, Plumber, Painter, Construction Helper, and Daily Wage Labour
Create an About page with founder story describing a local Assam entrepreneur connecting verified workers with customers
Create a Contact page displaying phone number, business email, and service areas (Tinsukia & Doomdooma)
Verify that the canister deployment configuration meets Internet Computer domain requirements (5-50 characters, letters/numbers/hyphens only)
Ensure all frontend routes and pages load correctly after deployment fix
Test backend actor connectivity and verify all API endpoints are responding correctly after deployment
Update contact information with phone number 8136009930 and email ajayyadavddm@gmail.com
Booking management dashboard to view and track customer bookings
Integrated online payment system with UPI and card payment options for booking fees
Enhance the existing Stripe payment integration to support multiple payment methods including UPI, cards (Visa, Mastercard, Amex), and net banking options in the checkout session
Verify that the backend createBooking method in main.mo properly validates all required booking fields and returns descriptive error messages for validation failures
Fix login option functionality that is not working
Verify that the AuthClient initialization in useInternetIdentity.ts is correctly configured with the proper Internet Identity URL and delegation identity settings
Configure UPI payment integration with UPI ID 8136009930@kotak811 to resolve payment system errors
Update the backend Stripe integration in main.mo to include UPI payment method configuration with UPI ID 8136009930@kotak811 in the checkout session creation
Add error handling in the backend payment flow to return descriptive error messages when UPI payment configuration fails or is invalid
Configure logged-in user's Internet Identity principal as super admin with full access rights to admin dashboard
Update backend main.mo to capture the caller's principal from the current authenticated Internet Identity session and grant super admin role with full access rights
Add a backend method to set or update the super admin principal that can only be called once during initial setup or by the current super admin
